nodes.text: Ashbo was the name given to the star in the Atollon system by the Lasat, a word that was roughly translated to "steady" or "balanced." The Lasat databases did include the coordinates of the star and few details on Atollon. The Boosahn Keeraw attached an emphasized significance to stellar constellations, and included stellar information into their weapons. Because of this, the Lasat who followed traditional methods of navigation by bo-rifle used Ashbo's constant position.
